Html:
Can I somehow get the event completion of construction of structure when all the designers are satisfied.
For example, I have to execute the code immediately after downloading the program, interacting with other elements, but somehow I need to register a reaction to the event.
I hope I'm clearly laid out, thanks.

Hi,

You might find the IPartImportsSatisfiedNotification interface useful, as it provides a means of being notified when an import has been satisfied.

You'll find more information regarding that in the following links:

  • Chapter 4: Modular Application Development, Detecting When a Module Has Been Loaded
  • MEF, Declaring Imports (IPartImportsSatisfiedNotification)

I hope you find this helpful

Agustin Adami
http://blogs.southworks.net/aadami
